alert.note: Alert for Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 4:02AM CST until January 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Louisiana. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from noon Monday to 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 3 AM to 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call 511 for road information.

area.areaDesc: Evangeline; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry
